channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-34936|2024-05-23T16:34:48.083863 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in /view/event1.php in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the month parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-34930|2024-05-23T16:26:05.275343 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in /model/all_events1.php in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0 allows attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the month parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-35080|2024-05-23T18:50:02.605968 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: An arbitrary file upload vulnerability in the gok4 method of inxedu v2024.4 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via uploading a crafted .jsp file.

item.title: CVE-2024-35079|2024-05-23T18:51:25.918070 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: An arbitrary file upload vulnerability in the uploadAudio method of inxedu v2024.4 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via uploading a crafted .jsp file.

item.title: CVE-2024-33528|2024-05-23T16:44:31.876649 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A Stored Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ILIAS 7 before 7.30 and ILIAS 8 before 8.11 allows remote authenticated attackers with tutor privileges to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via XML file upload.

item.title: CVE-2024-34931|2024-05-23T16:31:57.216830 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in /model/update_subject.php in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the name parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-34927|2024-05-23T16:22:36.587941 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in /model/update_classroom.php in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the name parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-34935|2024-05-23T16:34:29.183027 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in /view/conversation_history_admin.php in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the conversation_id parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-34933|2024-05-23T16:33:35.391285 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in /model/update_grade.php in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the admission_fee parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-33527|2024-05-23T16:43:28.392376 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A Stored Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the "Import of Users and login name of user" feature in ILIAS 7 before 7.30 and ILIAS 8 before 8.11 allows remote authenticated attackers with administrative privileges to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via XML file upload.

item.title: CVE-2024-35085|2024-05-23T16:53:52.706138 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: J2EEFAST v2.7.0 was discovered to contain a SQL injection vulnerability via the findPage function in ProcessDefinitionMapper.xml.

item.title: CVE-2024-35081|2024-05-23T17:02:08.467508 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: LuckyFrameWeb v3.5.2 was discovered to contain an arbitrary file deletion vulnerability via the fileName parameter in the fileDownload method.

item.title: CVE-2024-35375|2024-05-23T18:53:33.722248 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: There is an arbitrary file upload vulnerability on the media add .php page in the backend of the website in version 5.7.114 of DedeCMS

item.title: CVE-2024-34929|2024-05-23T16:25:18.755220 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in /view/find_friends.php in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the my_index parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-34934|2024-05-23T16:33:58.412771 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in /view/emarks_range_grade_update_form.php in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the conversation_id parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-35083|2024-05-23T16:46:30.446743 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: J2EEFAST v2.7.0 was discovered to contain a SQL injection vulnerability via the findPage function in SysLoginInfoMapper.xml.

item.title: CVE-2024-34932|2024-05-23T16:33:14.811551 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in /model/update_exam.php in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the name parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-33525|2024-05-23T16:39:21.168782 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A Stored Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the "Import of organizational units and title of organizational unit" feature in ILIAS 7.20 to 7.29 and ILIAS 8.4 to 8.10 as well as ILIAS 9.0 allows remote authenticated attackers with administrative privileges to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via XML file upload.

item.title: CVE-2021-36088|2024-05-23T15:30:01.721427 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: Fluent Bit (aka fluent-bit) 1.7.0 through 1.7.4 has a double free in flb_free (called from flb_parser_json_do and flb_parser_do).

item.title: CVE-2024-35570|2024-05-23T18:29:28.733625 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: An arbitrary file upload vulnerability in the component \controller\ImageUploadController.class of inxedu v2.0.6 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via uploading a crafted jsp file.

item.title: CVE-2024-33526|2024-05-23T16:41:36.644273 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A Stored Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the "Import of user role and title of user role" feature in ILIAS 7 before 7.30 and ILIAS 8 before 8.11 allows remote authenticated attackers with administrative privileges to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via XML file upload.

item.title: CVE-2024-35082|2024-05-23T16:58:35.859783 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: J2EEFAST v2.7.0 was discovered to contain a SQL injection vulnerability via the findPage function in SysOperLogMapper.xml.

item.title: CVE-2024-35084|2024-05-23T16:57:22.714542 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: J2EEFAST v2.7.0 was discovered to contain a SQL injection vulnerability via the findPage function in SysMsgPushMapper.xml.

item.title: CVE-2024-35086|2024-05-23T17:00:14.852908 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: J2EEFAST v2.7.0 was discovered to contain a SQL injection vulnerability via the findPage function in BpmTaskFromMapper.xml .

item.title: CVE-2024-35090|2024-05-23T16:52:15.540088 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: J2EEFAST v2.7.0 was discovered to contain a SQL injection vulnerability via the findPage function in SysUreportFileMapper.xml.

item.title: CVE-2024-33529|2024-05-23T16:45:51.895571 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: ILIAS 7 before 7.30 and ILIAS 8 before 8.11 as well as ILIAS 9.0 allow remote authenticated attackers with administrative privileges to execute operating system commands via file uploads with dangerous types.

item.title: CVE-2024-34928|2024-05-23T16:23:35.213342 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in /model/update_subject_routing.php in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the grade parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-35091|2024-05-23T17:04:00.401556 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: J2EEFAST v2.7.0 was discovered to contain a SQL injection vulnerability via the findPage function in SysTenantMapper.xml.

item.title: CVE-2024-31843|2024-05-23T19:01:58.866773 -- n/a -- n/a
item.description: An issue was discovered in Italtel Embrace 1.6.4. The Web application does not properly check the parameters sent as input before they are processed on the server side. This allows authenticated users to execute commands on the Operating System.
